events.name: NUS Biathlon 2022
events.message: Follow us on our social media for the latest updates!
description: Getting busier week by week? Remember to unwind and take a breather!

Presenting to you the most anticipated annual swim-and-run event in NUS - NUS Biathlon 2022! Organized by fellow NUS students, NUS Biathlon is open to the NUS community and the public to de-stress and indulge in sports. Due to the current COVID-19 restrictions, NUS Biathlon 2022 will be held in a hybrid series, both physically and virtually! Join us this March and be part of the sporting community in NUS!
